word_mean: 〔复symphyses〕［希］〔NA〕联合：为软骨关节的一种类型，其骨对合面由纤维软骨板紧密连接

sentence.Network_en: At 12 weeks the fundus becomes palpable at the symphysis pubis.
sentence.Network_cn: 12周时可在耻骨联合上触及宫底.

sentence.Network_en: Objective To discuss a better method to treat orbitozygomatic complex symphysis fractures.
sentence.Network_cn: 目的:探讨治疗颧眶部联合骨折的较完善的方法.

sentence.Network_en: Conclusions It is an ideal way to treat pubic symphysis separation with reconstruction plate fixation.
sentence.Network_cn: 结论重建钢板内固定治疗耻骨联合分离是一种较理想的方法.

Conclusions It is an ideal way to treat symphysis separation with reconstruction plate fixation ., 结论重建钢板内固定治疗耻骨联合分离是一种较理想的方法.
透明软骨结合 synchondrosis纤维软骨联合 symphysis滑膜关节 synovial joints
...有着过寸长的牙齿,可以说的上是当地至高无上的捕食者。克氏巨海豚的化石不完整,吻部化石破损,保存的前上颌骨前沿部分长度达560 mm,显示它有极长及笨重的前上颌骨。保留的下颌骨联合(symphysis)部分达300 mm,但下颌骨前端缺失,下颌骨化石存有多达32个齿槽且一共长约484 mm,于化石中并没有牙齿化石和齿槽相连,整个下颌骨前边狭幼,背腹呈横向。克氏巨海豚.

derivation.yuyuan_name: late 16th cent. (in sense 2): modern Latin, from Greek sumphusis, from sun- 'together' + phusis 'growth'

means.word_mean: 1. an abnormal adhesion of two or more structures
2. a growing together of parts or structures
